description.value:
You perform surgical adjustments to disguise a willing ally or your construct companion. This counts as preparing a disguise to Impersonate, taking 10 minutes and requiring a healer's toolkit instead of a disguise kit. The DC to see through the deception with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Seek] is your Medicine DC (@Check[perception|against:medicine|rollerRole:target|traits:secret|options:action:seek]) unless the disguised character's Deception DC is higher. If the target directly interacts with someone while disguised, they gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their Deception check.

You can reverse this effect with another 10-minute surgery. The disguised character can also end it as a free action when they receive any healing effect.
